title: Timeline: Eight years of Apple iPhone
text:
Timeline: Eight years of Apple iPhone Nidhi Singal New Delhi   11, 2015 | 18:32 IST 
It was on June 29, 2007, when the first iPhone went on sale and changed the smartphone industry upside down. The world was happy with the physical keypad and the stylus-driven touch displays when Steve Jobs introduced the capacitive touch display on the first iPhone. Since then, the smartphones have actually become SMARTphones. 
Here's a timeline of the Apple iPhone since its launch:
